8.question: Why is Schumann's Piano Quintet Op. 44 considered a watershed work?
8.correct: It made the Piano and string quartet format the favoured one for Piano quintets
incorrect: It made the Piano and string quartets the disliked format for Piano quintets
It made the Piano quintet the favoured format

12.question: What is one feature of Schumann's Quintet that distinguishes it from Classical (e.g. Mozart and Haydn) Sonata form?
12.correct: Tendency towards a continuous texture in which many of the ends of thematic units and cadence points elide with the next thematic unit
incorrect: Tendency towards a dense texture in which many of the ends of thematic units end in cadences that have dense voicings
An extensive use of ornamentation and expressive techniques
